title: Some serif fonts
content:
Could someone help to identify the serif fonts in these images?  
Thanks in advance!

Font: 

 Requiem HTF, Mrs Eaves 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071708/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [viener-summer-concert2013.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071708/http:/typophile.com/files/viener-summer-concert2013.jpg) | 215.22 KB |
| [img3195732.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071708/http:/typophile.com/files/img3195732.jpg) | 161.07 KB |
| [1546232\_586518938092586\_1088749193\_n.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071708/http:/typophile.com/files/1546232_586518938092586_1088749193_n.jpg) | 33.46 KB |
author: kennyisback

comments.content:
1. 'SOMMERNACHTS KONZERTS': [Requiem](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071708/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/requiem/overview) HTF  
2. 'A YEAR TO REMEMBER': could be [Mrs Eaves](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071708/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/mrs-eaves-ot)

Solved!  
Thank you very much Ryuk!
